name: Urban God of Medicine
author: Yuewen Manhua &#40阅文漫画&#41
content: &quotFive years ago, the Ye family was destroyed, and the trash Ye Chen disappeared mysteriously.&quot Five years later, that Ye Family trash is back! He came back with a cultivating body that penetrated the heavens and the earth and cried, &quotGhosts and gods!&quot This time, Ye Chen wants to make the sky fall in awe! Let the Earth tremble! To be in control of everything, to the top of the sky！”
